title.rendered: New ME centers inaugurated in Assam

content.rendered: Four new Mission Education centers were inaugurated in Assam to cater to the needs of the under privileged children there. These children belong to very poor families and the parents of these children are either daily wage earner s or work as rag pickers. Most of the children are first generation learners and their parents are overjoyed that their children are getting an education which will in future improve their conditions.
